wikipedia.title: Roxanne Shante
wikipedia.extract: Lolita Shanté Gooden (born March 8, 1970), better known by her stage name Roxanne Shante, is an American hip hop musician and rapper. Born and raised in the Queensbridge Projects of Queens, New York City, Shante first gained attention through the Roxanne Wars and was part of the Juice Crew. The 2018 film Roxanne Roxanne is a dramatization of Shante's life.

opinions.details: “洛葛仙妮”是比较近的译法了，此前还有“萝珊”、“罗克珊”等译法，不知大家常见的是哪种？
可以用这个，因为netflix今年早些时候刚用了
